alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 5:20AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern West Baton Rouge, central Iberville and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 545 AM CDT... At 519 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Atchafalaya Welcome Center, or 11 miles northeast of Catahoula, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Plaquemine, Port Allen, Addis, Brusly, Rosedale, Grosse Tete and Ramah. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 128 and 156. Interstate 110 in Louisiana near mile marker 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge
